problem_text: Q R S T is an isosceles trapezoid with median X Y. Find T S if Q R = 22 and X Y = 15.
compact_text: QRST is an isosceles trapezoid with median XY. Find TS if QR = 22 and XY = 15.
annotat_text:
QRST is an isosceles trapezoid with median $\overline{X Y}$
Find $T S$ if $Q R=22$ and $X Y=15$
